document.full_text: a hard-line publication called on security forces on wednesday to arrest president mahmoud ahmadinejad's closest political aide amid a widening political power struggle.
document.title: middle east: iran: publication calls for arrest of president's closest political aide
lines_and_colors: a hard-line publication called on security forces on wednesday to arrest president mahmoud ahmadinejad's closest political aide amid a widening political power struggle.
